ygData.subject: Re: Enthrall change or is it just me?
ygData.msgSnippet: The last patch had decreased casting times for all the higher level spells like Enthrall.   Check out Baelish s sight for more details on exactly what the
ygData.messageBody:
The last patch had decreased casting times for all the higher level spells
like Enthrall. Check out Baelish's sight for more details on exactly what
the patch did for you.

From his Site:
Quote
PATCH DAY
Patch Day again and some nice improvements including increased loot drops in
the planes, and an improvement for Enchanters with 2.5 second casting times
for all mesmerise series spells.

The screaming terror bug causing 20 second full stuns has been fixed, and a
tad-late announcement about guards being buffed up has finally come forth.


Click here for details.

Submitted by Baelish, 11:49 AM
End Quote


His site: http://eq.castersrealm.com/

--
Bahir



----- Original Message -----
From: Garett <osmosis@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 11:38 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Enthrall change or is it just me?


> From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
>
> Lately enthrall seems to have a much faster recast time. I jus turned 32
so
> I dont know if that has anything to do with it, but it went from a 5
second
> recharge to a one second recharge. Can anyone else confirm this?
>
> Cogg - Rallos Zek
>
> >
